plans.name: Brow Lamination Package
features: Full, defined brows for up to 6 weeks

items.q: What eyebrow services do you offer?
items.a: We offer eyebrow shaping, tinting, microblading, and lamination to help you achieve your desired look.

items.q: How long does an eyebrow appointment take?
items.a: Most appointments take between 30 to 60 minutes, depending on the service you choose.
Yes, our certified technicians use sterile tools and follow strict hygiene protocols to ensure your safety.

items.q: How should I prepare for my eyebrow appointment?
items.a: Please arrive with clean skin and avoid using any makeup or skincare products on your brows before your appointment.

items.q: How long do the results last?
items.a: Results vary by service: shaping and tinting last 2-4 weeks, while microblading can last up to 18 months with proper care.
